about.title: About Us
about.bodytext: Hello, thank you for visiting my website!
about.bodytext2: I'm from Germany but I can speak and understand English pretty well.
about.bodytext3: Please call me Caesar, I'm a graphics designer and developer. This Website is 100% authentic.
about.bodytext4: You can buy graphics designs from me, that I will design especially for you.
about.bodytext5: You have to describe what you want to have, so that I can do it as good as I can.
about.bodytext6: You can decide between: logos, banners (twitter, Youtube...) Avatars and your own thoughts.
about.bodytext7: You can contact me on social media, just go to Home to see it.
about.bodytext8: I really hope you like my Web site and like my designs. -Caesar
